Subjects see every three week 12-week , open-label study . All efficacy safety assessment perform visit . Subjects compliant use study medication ( i.e . fail take medication three consecutive day ) discontinue study . All female , regardless age , undergo urine pregnancy test screen subject require urine drug screen screen visit test drug abuse . At study conclusion , subject give option continue medication ( via prescription ) cover insurance , follow clinic refer another psychiatrist . All study subject offer follow-up care CBT and/or medication outpatient clinic ( covered insurance ) give list appropriate referral community .
